name: NotePad
0:
”Alexa, ask note pad to write a note”
”Alexa, ask note pad to read my notes”
”Alexa, ask note pad to take note”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: note pad
des:
The Notes skill lets you dictate a note to Alexa, to be stored and read aloud at a later date.

The note will then delete itself once it has been read aloud, giving you security and peace of mind that your messages won't fall into the wrong hands!

The premium subscription allows you to save notes indefinitely to be read back as many times as you wish.

UPDATED: We have completely rewritten Note Pad to provide a more responsive experience, and to lay the groundwork for further improvements and features coming soon. Watch this space!
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
